fplR
  • Reference
  • Articles

Summary data for fixtures in the current FPL season

Gives a tibble containing data on all fixtures in the current FPL season.

fixtures()

Examples

fixtures()
#> # A tibble: 380 x 15
#>       id kickoff_time_formatted event_day                  stats
#>  * <int>                  <chr>     <int>                 <list>
#>  1    82                   <NA>        NA   <data.frame [0 x 0]>
#>  2     1           11 Aug 19:45         1 <data.frame [10 x 10]>
#>  3     7           12 Aug 12:30         2 <data.frame [10 x 10]>
#>  4     3           12 Aug 15:00         2 <data.frame [10 x 10]>
#>  5     4           12 Aug 15:00         2 <data.frame [10 x 10]>
#>  6     5           12 Aug 15:00         2 <data.frame [10 x 10]>
#>  7     6           12 Aug 15:00         2 <data.frame [10 x 10]>
#>  8     8           12 Aug 15:00         2 <data.frame [10 x 10]>
#>  9     2           12 Aug 17:30         2 <data.frame [10 x 10]>
#> 10    10           13 Aug 13:30         3   <data.frame [0 x 0]>
#> # ... with 370 more rows, and 11 more variables: team_h_difficulty <int>,
#> #   team_a_difficulty <int>, code <int>, kickoff_time <chr>,
#> #   team_h_score <int>, team_a_score <int>, finished <lgl>, minutes <int>,
#> #   event <int>, team_a <chr>, team_h <chr>
